mapper.select: update INSBDistribution set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},agreementid = #{agreementid},deptid = #{deptid},distritype = #{distritype},providerid = #{providerid},distrcompany = #{distrcompany},distpaytype = #{distpaytype},chargefee = #{chargefee} where id = #{id}
